'''Malva Meadowgrass'''<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power|The Rings of Power]], Season 1 Episode 7, "[[The Eye]]"</ref> was a [[Harfoots|Harfoot]] of the [[Second Age]]. Her character was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power|The Rings of Power]]'' television series by [[Amazon Studios]], where she was portrayed by [[Thusitha Jayasundera]].<ref>"[[A Shadow of the Past]]"</ref>
